credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: The Arts Mourning at the Tomb of Raphael
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
description: Depiction of allegory: women mourn round sarcophagus in central foreground. Genius with lowered torch leans upon right corner. Palette and lyre lie against base. Stream god shown at extreme left, another bearded god at right. Procession of women comes from left rear. Some tombstones shown in middle distance.
name: Drawing
